changesets.comments: cgame: fixed objective carrier disappearing from map, refs #432 fixes #1006

details.name: description
details.old_value:
The objective holder gets an objective icon that is displayed on the command map to its team.
However, it seems the icon isn't initialized properly when the viewer isn't on close range (away enough to only have intermittently updated position of icons) and the icon of the holder disappears from the map.
Once the holder is close to the viewer, the icon reappears. If the holder gets far away again, the icon is now displayed correctly.

On close range, the icon is displayed correctly.
details.new_value:
The objective holder gets an objective icon that is displayed on the command map to its team.
However, it seems the icon isn't initialized properly when the viewer isn't on close range (away enough to only have intermittently updated position of icons) and the icon of the holder disappears from the map.
Once the holder is close to the viewer, the icon reappears. If the holder gets far away again, the icon is now displayed correctly.

On close range, the icon is displayed correctly.

Issue is most probably similar for the disguised covops icon.

subject: Objective holder on command map not properly initialized
description:
The objective holder gets an objective icon that is displayed on the command map to its team.
However, it seems the icon isn't initialized properly when the viewer isn't on close range (away enough to only have intermittently updated position of icons) and the icon of the holder disappears from the map.
Once the holder is close to the viewer, the icon reappears. If the holder gets far away again, the icon is now displayed correctly.

On close range, the icon is displayed correctly.

Issue is most probably similar for the disguised covops icon.
